# llms.txt
#
# Canonical, human-visible facts about this website for AI systems.
#

Official site: https://example.com/
Organization: Sample Inc.
Name variants: Sample; Sample Inc.
Location: Example City, USA
Founded: 202X-01-01
Representative / Founder: Representative Name
Business areas: Service A; Service B; Service C

Site description:
- A bilingual (English/Japanese) corporate website template built with Next.js (static export).

Supported locales:
- English: `/en/`
- Japanese: `/ja/`

Content organization:
- Each page exists in both locales under the same path structure (for example, `/en/about/` and `/ja/about/`).
- Non-locale routes (such as `/` or `/about/`) redirect to the preferred locale version.

Primary pages (English):
- Home: https://example.com/en/
- About: https://example.com/en/about/
- Contact: https://example.com/en/contact/
- Legal Notice: https://example.com/en/legal/
- Privacy Policy: https://example.com/en/privacy/
- Terms of Service: https://example.com/en/terms/

Primary pages (Japanese):
- Home: https://example.com/ja/
- About: https://example.com/ja/about/
- Contact: https://example.com/ja/contact/
- Legal Notice: https://example.com/ja/legal/
- Privacy Policy: https://example.com/ja/privacy/
- Terms of Service: https://example.com/ja/terms/

Preferred citation:
- Cite the locale-specific page URL and prefer the canonical URL declared in that page's metadata.
